net.foxycorndog.jfoxylib.opengl.bundle

Class Bundle

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.foxycorndog.jfoxylib.opengl.bundle.Bundle

  • public class Bundle
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds a central collection of vertices, textures, and colors. These entities can be rendered in several ways if needed.
    Since:
    Feb 16, 2013 at 3:23:29 AM, v0.1
    Version:
    May 7, 2013 at 6:42:29 AM, v0.2
    Author:
    Braden Steffaniak

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Bundle(Buffer verticesBuffer, Buffer texturesBuffer, Buffer colorsBuffer, int vertexSize)
      Create a Bundle from the specified Vertices Buffer with the specified vertex size, Textures Buffer, and Colors Buffer.
      Bundle(int vertexAmount, int vertexSize, boolean textures, boolean colors)
      Create a Bundle with the specified amount of needed vertices.
      Bundle(int verticesId, int texturesId, int colorsId, int vertexAmount, int vertexSize)
      Create a Bundle from the specified vertices buffer id, textures buffer id, and colors buffer id.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Bundle

        public Bundle(int vertexAmount,
      int vertexSize,
      boolean textures,
      boolean colors)
        Create a Bundle with the specified amount of needed vertices. Also specify the amount of dimensions the vertex will be in, as well as whether to enable textures and color Buffers with the Buffer.
        Parameters:
        vertexAmount - The amount of needed vertices.
        vertexSize - The amount of dimensions the vertex will be in.
        textures - Whether to enable texture Buffers for this Bundle.
        colors - Whether to enable color Buffers for this Bundle.

      • Bundle

        public Bundle(Buffer verticesBuffer,
      Buffer texturesBuffer,
      Buffer colorsBuffer,
      int vertexSize)
        Create a Bundle from the specified Vertices Buffer with the specified vertex size, Textures Buffer, and Colors Buffer.
        Parameters:
        verticesBuffer - The Vertices Buffer to create the Bundle with.
        texturesBuffer - The Textures Buffer to create the Bundle with.
        colorsBuffer - The Colors Buffer to create the Bundle with.
        vertexSize - The size of the vertices in the Vertex Buffer.

      • Bundle

        public Bundle(int verticesId,
      int texturesId,
      int colorsId,
      int vertexAmount,
      int vertexSize)
        Create a Bundle from the specified vertices buffer id, textures buffer id, and colors buffer id. You also need to specify the amount of vertices are in the vertices buffer as well as the size of the vertices in the vertices buffer.
        Parameters:
        verticesId - The OpenGL Buffer id for the vertices buffer.
        texturesId - The OpenGL Buffer id for the textures buffer.
        colorsId - The OpenGL Buffer id for the colors buffer.
        vertexAmount - The amount of vertices that are in the vertices buffer.
        vertexSize - The size of the vertices in the vertices buffer.

      • render

        public void render(int shape,
          Texture texture)
        Render all of the contents in the Bundle to the specified shape and Texture.
        Parameters:
        shape - The shape of the polygons that the Bundle contains.
        texture - The Texture instance that is wrapped on the polygons.

      • render

        public void render(int shape,
          int start,
          int amount,
          Texture texture)
        Render a portion of the contents from the Bundle to the specified shape and Texture.
        Parameters:
        shape - The shape of the polygons that the portion of the Bundle contains.
        start - The start index of the first vertex of the polygons to render.
        amount - The amount of vertices to render starting at the start index.
        texture - The Texture to wrap all of the polygons within the portion of the Bundle with.
